artist: Painter: After Paolo Veronese; Engraver: Louis Claude Le Grand
description: Annunciation; Virgin seated at left, Archangel Gabriel at right with lily in right hand and left hand pointing upward; God with cherubs and dove above
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

In plate in black: [78/ Paul Veronese pinx., Le Grand sc./ Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain]; on sheet in pencil lower left: [See Cagliari]
portfolio: From Cabinet Poullain: Collection de cent-vingt estampes gravées d'après les tableaux & dessins que composoient le Cabinet de M. Poullain, plate 78
